incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 20/10/2025 04:00 UTC End time : 20/10/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.
